title: Tear-Stained Teddy Bears
description: When Owen Ramsey moves to Till Park, he's not looking for anything other than a fresh start and a vacation from trouble. But trouble immediately finds him in the form of a blonde bombshell of a waitress named Trish.There's just one small problem...Trish is pregnant.With a child that isn't her own.The private surrogate program Trish Mackey entered into seemed like a win-win at the time. However, when emotions start to run high and a world of possibilities open up to her, Trish is certain that the tiny person growing inside her is about to turn her entire world upside down.
author: Catherine  Black
